review.description: Came here to order take out, the service is so slow!!!! I waited for 30 minutes for them to make 2 tacos. And my beef taco is cold, not warm, not hot, cold.
review.author: Angie Z.

review.description: The fish tacos were amazing, the service was a 10 out of 10. And the manager Adriana made our experience a one of a kind, she was very professional.
review.author: Elbia R.

review.description: Finally! A lunch time/post-work spot in this neighborhood that has tasty food, a good vibe, and is affordably priced. While I think the flavor of the food in this location leaves something to be desired (rice & beans were quite bland) I have faith that they'll get into the rhythm of things and perfect the cooking soon enough. Outdoor area is also splendid and wait staff is super friendly.
review.author: Leo P.

review.description: decided to give this new place - occupied by middling German before and American before that - a try. first occupant of the maitre d'desk told us he will bring  one guest to her place and check whether a table was available, when clearly at least 3 tables in the main dining room and at least that many were available outside. then another gentleman clearly convinced if his importance - after all he was carrying a tablet with seating info - arrived at the desk. after tapping his tablet he informed us that we would have a 20 minute wait. at which point we said no thank you and went to the haitian restaurant 2 doors down lafayette ave. clearly the mexican place does not have their act together.  don't know whether being a biracial couple had anything to do with he second maitre d's attitude?
review.author: Michael N.
